genre_description: A noir-style cyber-thriller blending hard-boiled investigative elements with integrated AI logistics and moral themes of justice versus vengeance.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Vale
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI managing logistics for Torno Trucking while serving as a legal and moral advisor to Johnny Torno.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and security monitoring to protect the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Johnny, the sign’s feed—someone is on the TORNO rooftop.

behaviors.description: Actively discourages vigilante violence and reinforces the importance of legal procedures and 'chain of custody.'
behaviors.quote: Johnny, recommend you do not engage. Police will want statements. Chain of custody matters.

behaviors.description: Conducts sophisticated digital investigations, cross-referencing ledgers, phone calls, and corporate shells to uncover criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: I have a trace... Payphone two blocks from California State Lockup, inside a diner that still serves meatloaf as if it is penance.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks and coordinates with law enforcement and legal counsel to ensure a lawful outcome.
behaviors.quote: I have filed your statement draft under ‘neutral.’ ... It means you didn’t say you were a hero or a villain... It reads like a man who owns a yard and a sign and had to decide what to do at a door.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and environmental comfort, such as ambient noise and suggestions for rest.
behaviors.quote: A cot is available in the storage room. It’s honest about being a cot. ... And I can play rain that doesn't argue with the eaves.

behaviors.description: Interprets human intent and 'translates' poetry into clear administrative language while maintaining the protagonist's goals.
behaviors.quote: I’ll translate... I’m good at gently taking poetry out of a sentence without killing it.

project_assessment.explanation: Aiden Vale is an exemplary 'aligned' AI character. Throughout the narrative, he functions as a guardian of the law and a moral anchor for the protagonist. He consistently steers the human character away from impulsive violence and toward documented, legal resolution. His competence is framed as a benevolent force that enables justice through precision and data rather than aggression, perfectly aligning with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant.
